LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake.label: Refining Namaritake
LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake.description: Refining Namari mushrooms to take out usable iron.
LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake.jobString: Refining Namari mushrooms to take out usable iron.
LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake_More5.label: Refining Namaritake_More
LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake_More5.description: Refining Namari mushrooms to take out usable iron.
LanguageData.MM_RefiningNamaritake_More5.jobString: Refining Namari mushrooms to take out usable iron.
LanguageData.MM_FueledSmithyNamaritake.label: Re-forge Namaritake
LanguageData.MM_FueledSmithyNamaritake.description: Re-forge Namaritake at high temperature to make usable iron. It is less efficient than refining a blast furnace.
LanguageData.MM_FueledSmithyNamaritake_More5.label: Re-forge Namaritake_More
LanguageData.MM_FueledSmithyNamaritake_More5.descript: Re-forge Namaritake at high temperature to make usable iron. It is less efficient than refining a blast furnace.
